layout.singingstanza: I'm spend -- ing time now, Just me and my God! I'm ling'r -- ing long -- er; Just me and my God! The sheep are a' snor -- ing! I'm sing -- ing and psalm -- ing! My heart is a harp -- sing Un -- to my God! I'm spend -- ing time now, Just me and my God! I'm ling'r -- ing long -- er; Just me and my God! Your words are sweet as Hon -- ey un -- to my taste, And a light un -- to my path; I'm ling'r -- ing, Just me and my God!

lyrics.stanza: I'm spending time now, Just me and my God! I'm lingering longer; Just me and my God!
The sheep are a' snoring! I'm singing and psalming! My heart is a harp-sing Unto my God!
I'm spending time now, Just me and my God! I'm lingering longer; Just me and my God!
Your words are sweet as Honey unto my taste, And a light unto my path; I'm lingering, Just me and my God!
